message: Let's make a deal! I think 60/40 is a fair split to start.
I understand you want a larger share, but my previous offer was already generous. Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at your potential gains.
I'll take a smaller share than before, but I still think 52/48 is more fair.
Bob, time is running out.  I'm moving closer to your offer, but this is my final concession.
